response.content:
Dear ex-
I know the thought of having to face my ex and all the pain and suffering that this has caused me is terrible, but I can't help but feel that I have made a mistake. I know that I wasn't the one who farted, and I don't think that I deserve any of the blame for what happened. I hope you understand and forgive me.
I want to express my sincere regret for what happened, but I can't help but feel like I'm the one who ruined our marriage. I know that I didn't mean to cause any harm, but I felt like I had to try and fix things
